mapper.sql: a.sys_id AS "sysid", a.sys_createTime AS "syscreateTime", a.sys_userAge AS "sysuserAge", a.sys_userLogin AS "sysuserLogin", a.sys_userName AS "sysuserName", a.sys_status AS "status", a.sys_userPassWord AS "sysuserPassWord", a.sys_file AS "sysFile", a.sys_role AS "roleId", r.rolename AS "role.rolename"
LEFT JOIN sys_role r on r.id = a.sys_role
mapper.select:
select
from sys_user a
where 1=1
AND a.sys_userLogin = #{sysuserLogin}
AND a.sys_status = "0"
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET sys_userName = #{sysuserName}, sys_userLogin = #{sysuserLogin}, sys_userPassWord = #{sysuserPassWord}, sys_userAge = #{sysuserAge}, sys_createTime = #{syscreateTime}, sys_file = #{sysFile}, sys_role = #{roleId} where sys_id = #{sysid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user( sys_id, sys_userLogin, sys_userName, sys_userPassWord, sys_userAge, sys_createTime, sys_file, sys_role, sys_status ) VALUES( #{sysid}, #{sysuserLogin}, #{sysuserName}, #{sysuserPassWord}, #{sysuserAge}, #{syscreateTime}, #{sysFile}, #{roleId}, #{status} )
mapper.delete: UPDATE sys_user a set a.sys_status = "1" WHERE sys_id = #{sysid}
